summary: During WW2, Lt. Rip Crandall, who was a yachtsman before the war, takes command of the USS Echo, a sailing ship, for a secret mission in waters patrolled by Japanese warships.
cast: Jack Lemmon|Ricky Nelson|John Lund|Chips Rafferty|Tom Tully|Joby Baker|Warren Berlinger|Patricia Driscoll|Mike Kellin|Richard Anderson|Alvy Moore|Joseph Gallison|Teru Shimada|George Shibata|Phil Adams|John Anderson|Tom Anthony|Nesdon Booth|Naaman Brown|Lysa D'Anjou|Henry Faber|Fuji|Clive Halliday|Gavin W. Harper|Dale Ishimoto|Roy Jenson|Lloyd Kino|Richard Quine|Hudson Shotwell|Sid Tomack|Richard Torrence|Ron Veto|Russ Whiteman|Mose Wilson
